27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abdullah bin 'Umar narrated:"A man came to the Prophet and said: 'O Messenger of Allah! How many times should the servant be pardoned?' The Prophet was silent. Then he said: 'O Messenger of Allah! How many times should the servant be pardoned?' He said: ' Seventy times each day

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْعَفْوِ عَنِ الْخَادِمِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Pardoning The Servant
